message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
I think we can do better than that. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up much more.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  If you reject this, we'll be back to square one with even less money for both of us.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I'm offering you more than half the original amount. Take it before inflation eats away at everything!
